reviewText: An instant classic.....many people don't know that may western movies are based on these very successful Shaw Brothers (SB) movies.  The Magnificent Seven with Yul Brenner, Charles Bronson and a host of other notable stars is loosely based on this film.  GREAT MOVIE!
When I ordered this DVD, I kept waiting for it to show up, it never did, I don't know whether it got lost in the mail or whatever.  The seller did refund me when I contacted them.
